name: Garnier Fructis Style Full Control Anti-Humidity Hairspray, Ultra Strong Hold, 8.25 oz.
short_description: Anti-humidity hairspray provides 24 hour ultra strong bounce-back hold and frizz protection
Strong yet flexible formula is infused with bamboo extract
Provides natural, healthy-looking movement for style that stays touchable all day long, even in extreme humidity
Light, sparkling fruity fragrance
product_description: Want ultra strong hold without compromise? Garnier Fructis Style Full Control Anti-Humidity Hairspray is a versatile, yet ultra strong hairspray that provides the hold you need, and the natural, healthy-looking movement you want. With 24 hour hold and anti-humidity protection, your style stays touchable all day long, even in extreme humidity. HOW DOES IT WORK? Our strong, yet flexible hairspray formula, infused with natural Bamboo Extract, keeps you in control of your style for 24 hours. Added frizz protection ensures bounce-back hold that lasts all day. Our light, sparkling fruity fragrance will leave your hair smelling fresh and vibrant. GET INSPIRED! Use any Garnier Fructis Style product before setting your style with Full Control Hairspray. For best results, use Garnier Fructis System of shampoos, conditioners and treatments. For more looks, tips and fun visit our Style Hub. • Anti-humidity hairspray provides 24 hour ultra strong bounce-back hold and frizz protection • Strong yet flexible formula is infused with Bamboo Extract • Provides natural, healthy-looking movement for style that stays touchable all day long, even in extreme humidity • Light, sparkling fruity fragrance Hold can 10 to 12 inches from hair and spray in an even, all-around motion. Spray on dry hair to finish any style. Layer where it's needed most for added hold. WARNING: Flammable. Avoid fire, flame and heat during application and until hair is fully dry. Avoid spraying in eyes. Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not store at temperatures above 120ºF. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal.

name: John Frieda Frizz Ease Moisture Barrier Hairspray, Firm Hold Hairspray, Seals Out Moisture, Blocks Frizz, Protects Against Heat, and Keeps Hair Straight with Long-Lasting Hold, 12 Oz
short_description: SMOOTH YOUR FRIZZY HAIR - John Frieda Moisture Barrier Hairspray helps to block out weather-induced frizz by repelling humidity for up to 24 hours
FORMULATED FOR INTENSE CONDITIONS - Featuring a firm hold, our Frizz Ease Hairspray will help prevent your style from falling in the rain or shine
BOOSTING SHINE FOR ANY HAIR TYPE - Best used as a finishing spray, our quick drying hairspray will give you an instant shine
SALON QUALITY - Combine with John Frieda Frizz Ease Shampoo and Conditioner for frizz fighting results from wild, unmanageable hair
LONG LASTING FRIZZ CONTROL - Combine with John Frieda Frizz Ease Shampoo and Conditioner for frizz fighting results from curly, dry, damaged, and unmanageable hair
product_description: John Frieda Frizz Ease Moisture Barrier Firm Hold Anti Frizz Hairspray locks in style, but protects from humidity for up to 24 hours. This quick-drying, strong-hold hairspray is dispensed in a firm mist to help create a solid barrier around hair, sealing out style-ruining moisture while keeping your locks frizz-free and in place. It dries quickly, boosts shine, and has a lightweight texture. Help keep your hair protected, rain or shine. Heat protectant spray for curly, frizzy hair detangles and straightens for optimal styling. This frizz-resistant, texture spray will leave your hair with a sleek, long lasting shine. Carefully formulated by Kao USA to fight dry, damaged hair by creating a humidity resistant barrier around frizzy hair to protect against unwanted frizz.

name: CHI Helmet Head Extra Firm Hairspray, Protects Against Humidity & Creates Voluminous Hairstyles, Sulfate & Paraben-Free, 10 Oz
short_description: EXTRA FIRM HOLD: CHI Helmet Head Hairspray offers an extra firm hold, keeping your hairstyle intact throughout the day. This hairspray provides long-lasting control for various hairstyles & combats the effects of humidity, keeping frizz & flyaways at bay.
QUICK-DRY FORMULA: The quick-dry formula allows for efficient styling, ensuring that your hair is set in place without unnecessary waiting time. Achieve your desired look with ease and convenience

CHI HAIRSPRAYS: CHI Sprays use ceramic and proteins to provide outstanding hair protection. Ceramic compound releases anions on the cuticles, which help to interlink the proteins into the hair strands imparting luster & strength for a healthy appearance.
HOW TO USE: Hold bottle 10-12″ away from hair. Spray evenly after styling hair to secure finish.

CHI: Founded by Farouk Shami, a hairdresser allergic to ammonia who sought to create the first ammonia-free hair color & has remained committed to crafting the finest ethical haircare. All CHI products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, & sulfate-free.
product_description: Product Description Fast drying aerosol hair spray protects against humidity and creates voluminous full bodied looks. Brand Story By CHI

name: Got2b Glued Blasting Freeze Hairspray, 12 oz, Pack of 2
short_description: Spike, cement and finish
Lasts until your next shampoo
Your hairdo will stay exactly where you want it
Use for: blasting hold
Provides hold so strong (it's wind-tunnel tested) your style will last until your next shampoo
product_description: got2b Glued Blasting Freeze Hairspray Freeze any style into place with got2b Blasting Freeze Spray. This styling staple delivers rigid, rock-hard hold that lasts until your next shampoo. Whether you're crafting spiked hair, slicked-back glam, or a lived-in tousled texture, this hairspray gives you the power to sculpt, shape, and lock. Spray through hair carelessly for that sexy, messy look or spray and twist tips into spikes for outrageous hold that will last until your next shampoo. Best for stuck-up styles and extreme rock-hard hair. Cool Tip: For over-the-top spikes, spray heavily and twist tips. Allow to dry and finish with an additional blast. For that messy look, spray hair from roots to ends and massage with fingertips in a circular motion. Finish with a direct blast to cement your style. To scrunch, layer Glued Spiking Glue through wet hair and finish with blasting freeze spray. Style it. Freeze it. Own it. You got2b fearless.

name: Rave 4X Mega Long-Lasting Firm Hold Hair Spray for Heat Protection, Volume and Shine - 24 Hour Hold & Anti Humidity Spray for Hair - Minimizes Frizz - Unscented & Non Aerosol - 11 Fl Oz
short_description: All-Weather Protection: Hold your style rain or shine. Keeps hair in place with long-lasting, 24-hour hold so you will be prepared for whatever mother nature throws your way in hot or cold weather.
Lock Out Frizz, Lock in Style: Formulated for curly or straight hair, ClimaShield Technology locks out frizz with extra humidity protection to provide the durable hold you expect.
Vitamin-Enhanced Formula: Lightly conditions hair and boosts body with vitamins E and C without being stiff or sticky. NO parabens, NO phthalates and NO sulfates.
To Apply: Shake well. Hold the can upright, 10-12 inches from hair. If dispenser clogs, remove sprayer and rinse with warm water.
